alert.note: Alert for Badlands Area; Custer County Plains; Fall River County Area; Pine Ridge Area; Southern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 18 at 1:16PM MDT until July 18 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 314, 315, 317, 321, 322, 325, 326, AND 332... .Hot and dry weather is occurring today. Temperatures will peak in the 90s to lower 100s. Minimum relative humidity values will drop to 10 to 15 percent. West to southwest winds will increase to 15-25 mph with gusts to 35 mph. Weather conditions are favorable for large fire growth. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 314, 315, 317, 321, 322, 325, 326, AND 332... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 314 Northern Campbell, 315 Southern Campbell, 317 Weston County Plains, 321 Southern Black Hills, 322 Fall River County Area, 325 Custer County Plains, 326 Pine Ridge Area and 332 Badlands Area. * WINDS...West 15 to 25 mph. Gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...10 to 15 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds, low relative humidity and dry fuels are producing critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Badlands Area; Custer County Plains; Fall River County Area; Pine Ridge Area; Southern Black Hills
